Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.altius.utils.StringUtils

    • Method Detail

      • split

        public static String[] split(String mainString,
                             char delim,
                             char textQualifier)
        To split a String into an array of strings based on the delimeter.
        Parameters:
        mainString - String that needs to be split
        delim - Delimiter to use. If you do not have a textQualifier set it to '*'
        textQualifier - delimeters wrapped inside a textQualifier are ignored as delimeters
        Returns:
        Returns the array of Strings after splitting

      • roundString

        public static String roundString(double originalNumber,
                                 int noOfDigits)
        Rounds a double to the No of digits
        Parameters:
        originalNumber - double to be rounded
        noOfDigits - no of digits to round to
        Returns:
        returns the rounded number in String format

      • round

        public static double round(double originalNumber,
                           int noOfDigits)
        Rounds a double to the No of digits
        Parameters:
        originalNumber - double to be rounded
        noOfDigits - no of digits to round to
        Returns:
        returns the rounded number

      • pad

        public static String pad(String str,
                         char padChar,
                         int len,
                         int direction)
        Pads a string with the padChar either on the left or the right
        Parameters:
        str - String to pad
        padChar - pad character to use
        len - total length of the output string including the padded characters
        direction - direction of padding. Use either LEFT or RIGHT
        Returns:
        returns the output String

      • cleanInputStreamForUpload

        public static InputStream cleanInputStreamForUpload(InputStream is)
        Cleans the InputStream by removing single quote, double quote and new line characters.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream that needs to be cleaned.
        Returns:
        returns the cleaned String

        Checks if a String is either null or empty
        Parameters:
        input - String to check
        Returns:
        returns true if the String was null or empty

      • isValidMobileNo

        public static boolean isValidMobileNo(String input)
        Checks if a String is a valid Mobile no. Must start with 7,8 or 9 and be comprised of 10 digits.
        Parameters:
        input - String to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid Mobile no and false if it is not

        Converts an Integer array into a String that is comma separated.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        converted String

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(String input)
        Checks if the given string is a valid number. The String can only contain digits and '.'
        Parameters:
        input - String to check
        Returns:
        true if it is a number and false if it is not

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(String input,
                               int len)
        Checks if a given string consists of the digits and is of a certain length
        Parameters:
        input - String to check
        len - the length the String must be of
        Returns:
        true if the given input consists only of number and is of given `len`

      • appendOrdinalSuffixToInt

        public static String appendOrdinalSuffixToInt(int i)
        Adds the ordinal suffix to a number in caps. So 11 will become 11 TH, 22 will become 22 ND etc
        Parameters:
        i - integer that you want to add ordinal suffix to
        Returns:
        returns the converted string

      • escapeQuotes

        public static String escapeQuotes(String s)
        Replaces single quotes and double quotes with the escaped sequence for those quotes
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        Returns:
        escaped String
